Item ID20997

The twisted bow is a reward from the Chambers of Xeric that requires a Ranged level of 85 to wield. It can fire any type of arrow, including dragon arrows.

Similar to the crystal bow, the bow has an attack range of 10 tiles. As all attacks have a maximum of 10 range, long range does not provide any attack distance benefit but may still be used to gain Defence XP.

Passive effect[edit | edit source]

Unlike other bows that have a set strength, the twisted bow functions differently: the higher the target's Magic level or Magic accuracy is (whichever is higher), the higher the bow's accuracy and damage. The accuracy multiplier caps at 140%, while the damage multiplier caps at 250%.[1][2] The Magic level or accuracy caps at 250 outside the Chambers of Xeric, and 350 within.

A c c u r a c y = 140 + 10 ⋅ 3 ⋅ M a g i c 10 − 10 100 − ( 3 ⋅ M a g i c 10 − 100 ) 2 100 % A c c u r a c y ∈ [ 0 , 140 ] D a m a g e = 250 + 10 ⋅ 3 ⋅ M a g i c 10 − 14 100 − ( 3 ⋅ M a g i c 10 − 140 ) 2 100 % D a m a g e ∈ [ 0 , 250 ] {\displaystyle {\begin{aligned}Accuracy&=140+{\frac {{\frac {10\cdot 3\cdot Magic}{10}}-10}{100}}-{\frac {\left({\frac {3\cdot Magic}{10}}-100\right)^{2}}{100}}\%&Accuracy\in [0,140]\\Damage&=250+{\frac {{\frac {10\cdot 3\cdot Magic}{10}}-14}{100}}-{\frac {\left({\frac {3\cdot Magic}{10}}-140\right)^{2}}{100}}\%&Damage\in [0,250]\end{aligned}}}

A graph that shows the accuracy and damage modifiers at different Magic levels. Note that the "buff %" is not an increase: at 100%, the accuracy and damage are normal rather than doubled.

The maximum hit with the twisted bow outside of the Chambers of Xeric is 86 (89 on accurate) with dragon arrows and 99 Ranged and using all damage boosting items and effects (ranging potion, Rigour, Ava's assembler, necklace of anguish, imbued Slayer helmet, and Zaryte vambraces). In Chambers of Xeric, the maximum hit is 101 (104 on accurate) with Elite Void Knight equipment and 91 without.

Due to this effect, the twisted bow is basically unmatched against targets with high Magic levels/accuracy, such as Commander Zilyana and Vasa Nistirio.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
11 May 2022
(update)

The twisted bow now requires level 85 Ranged to wield instead of level 75 Ranged.

21 April 2021
(update)

The twisted bow's prayer bonus has been reduced from 4 to 0.

9 August 2018
(update)

The item's value was increased from 90,000 to 4,000,000.

12 April 2018
(update)

A Magic level cap of 350 was added within the Chambers of Xeric, as the twisted bow performed worse if monsters had a Magic level of over 350, due to the equations acting as parabolas.

26 January 2017
(update)

The Magic level cap was removed within the Chambers of Xeric.

19 January 2017
(update)

A Magic level cap of 250 was added to the damage calculation, as it was too powerful against some bosses.

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • Early models for the bow by Mod West.

  • Model size adjustments after player feedback, with a dark bow for scale.

  • Proposal of colours for the bow. Option B was chosen.

  • Proposal of shapes for the bow. Option B was chosen.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • In an update on 28 February 2019, a twisted bow spawn was accidentally added east of the Farming Guild. The spawn was hotfixed shortly after the update[3] and the game was rolled back to the time of the update.[4]
  • The twisted bow is similar in function to the Hexhunter bow in RuneScape.
  • The ranger mercenary outside Theatre of Blood wields a twisted bow, and it can be seen in one of the webs hanging in Nylocas Vasilias' room along with its owner. However, this particular bow is a piece of scenery rather than an item. Examining it results in the message "It seems like the owner must've dropped it, how unfortunate!"
  • Upon release, attempting to light a fire after completing Barbarian Firemaking Training resulted in the message "Nothing interesting happens." With the release of the Inferno, the message displayed will now state "It'd be foolish to possibly damage such an expensive bow with a firemaking attempt. You're surprised you only realised this now!"
  • As a result of the twisted bow's introduction, General Graardor's magic level and magic defence bonus were adjusted as the bow originally outperformed other high-end weapons against him.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Kieren's Twitter account. 29 May 2017. (Archived from the original on 29 May 2020.) Mod Kieren: "Outside raids, magic cap at 250 Acc modifier: 140 + (10 * 3 Magic / 10 - 10) / 100 - ((3 Magic / 10 - 100) ^2) / 100 Capped at 140."
  2. ^ Jagex. Mod Kieren's Twitter account. 29 May 2017. (Archived from the original on 29 May 2020.) Mod Kieren: "Dmg modifier: 250 + (10 * 3 Magic / 10 - 14) / 100 - ((3 Magic / 10 - 140) ^2) / 100 Capped at 250."
  3. ^ Jagex. Old School RuneScape's Twitter account. 28 February 2019. (Archived from the original on 28 February 2019.) Old School RuneScape: "A bug involving Twisted Bows and the Farming guild has been hotfixed. Stand by while we assess our next steps. If you have acquired a Twisted Bows from anywhere other than Chambers of Xeric, they will be removed - attempting to sell them may result in action against your account."
  4. ^ The Old School Team. "Bug: Twisted Bows". 28 February 2019. (Archived from the original.) Old School RuneScape News.

[[File:Twisted bow detail.png|150px|left]]
The '''twisted bow''' is a reward from the [[Chambers of Xeric]] that requires a [[Ranged]] level of 85 to wield. It can fire any type of arrow, including [[dragon arrow]]s. 

Similar to the [[crystal bow]], the bow has an [[attack range]] of 10 tiles. As all attacks have a maximum of 10 range, [[Combat Options|long range]] does not provide any attack distance benefit but may still be used to gain [[Defence]] XP.

==Passive effect==
Unlike other bows that have a set strength, the twisted bow functions differently: the higher the target's [[Magic]] level or Magic accuracy is (whichever is higher), the higher the bow's accuracy and damage. The accuracy multiplier caps at 140%, while the damage multiplier caps at 250%.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Kieren|url=https://twitter.com/JagexKieren/status/869214311675285505|date=29 May 2017|archiveurl=https://archive.is/Sn0Fr|archivedate=29 May 2020|quote=Outside raids, magic cap at 250 Acc modifier: 140 + (10 * 3 Magic / 10 - 10) / 100 - ((3 Magic / 10 - 100) ^2) / 100 Capped at 140.}}{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Kieren|url=https://twitter.com/JagexKieren/status/869214343283564544|date=29 May 2017|archiveurl=https://archive.is/GB0ts|archivedate=29 May 2020|quote=Dmg modifier: 250 + (10 * 3 Magic / 10 - 14) / 100 - ((3 Magic / 10 - 140) ^2) / 100 Capped at 250.}} The Magic level or accuracy caps at 250 outside the [[Chambers of Xeric]], and 350 within.

<math>\begin{align}
Accuracy &= 140 + \frac{\frac{10 \cdot 3 \cdot Magic}{10} - 10}{100} - \frac{\left(\frac{3 \cdot Magic}{10} - 100\right)^2}{100} \% & Accuracy \in [0, 140]\\
Damage &= 250 + \frac{\frac{10 \cdot 3 \cdot Magic}{10} - 14}{100} - \frac{\left(\frac{3 \cdot Magic}{10} - 140\right)^2}{100} \% & Damage \in [0, 250]
\end{align}</math>

[[File:Chambers of Xeric (10).png|thumb|350px|A graph that shows the accuracy and damage modifiers at different Magic levels. Note that the "buff %" is not an {{wp|Percentage increase and decrease|increase}}: at 100%, the accuracy and damage are normal rather than doubled.]]
<!--
Calculator is defunct
{{Calculator:Twisted bow}}-->
The maximum hit with the twisted bow outside of the [[Chambers of Xeric]] is 86 (89 on accurate) with [[dragon arrow]]s and 99 [[Ranged]] and using all damage boosting items and effects ([[ranging potion]], [[Rigour]], [[Ava's assembler]], [[necklace of anguish]], [[Slayer helmet (i)|imbued Slayer helmet]], and [[Zaryte vambraces]]). In Chambers of Xeric, the maximum hit is 101 (104 on accurate) with [[Elite Void Knight equipment]] and 91 without.

Due to this effect, the twisted bow is basically unmatched against targets with high Magic levels/accuracy, such as [[Commander Zilyana]] and [[Vasa Nistirio]].

==Trivia==
*In {{UD|QoL and CoX Changes|an update}} on [[28 February]] [[2019]], a twisted bow spawn [[Twisted bow glitch|was accidentally added]] east of the [[Farming Guild]]. The spawn was hotfixed shortly after the update{{CiteTwitter|author=Old School RuneScape|url=https://twitter.com/OldSchoolRS/status/1101090319431581698|date=28 February 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.is/i56ZJ|archivedate=28 February 2019|quote=A bug involving Twisted Bows and the Farming guild has been hotfixed. Stand by while we assess our next steps. If you have acquired a Twisted Bows from anywhere other than Chambers of Xeric, they will be removed - attempting to sell them may result in action against your account.}} and the game was [[rollback|rolled back]] to the time of the update.{{CiteNews|url=http://services.runescape.com/m=news/bug-twisted-bows?oldschool=1|newsdate=28 February 2019|author=The Old School Team|title=Bug: Twisted Bows}}
*The twisted bow is similar in function to the [[RSW:Hexhunter bow|Hexhunter bow]] in ''[[RSW:RuneScape|RuneScape]]''.
*The ranger [[Mercenary (Theatre of Blood)|mercenary]] outside [[Theatre of Blood]] wields a twisted bow, and it can be seen in one of the webs hanging in [[Nylocas Vasilias]]' room along with its owner. However, this particular bow is a piece of scenery rather than an item. Examining it results in the message "''It seems like the owner must've dropped it, how unfortunate!''"
*Upon release, attempting to light a fire after completing [[Barbarian Training|Barbarian Firemaking Training]] resulted in the message "''Nothing interesting happens.''" With the release of the [[Inferno]], the message displayed will now state "''It'd be foolish to possibly damage such an expensive bow with a firemaking attempt. You're surprised you only realised this now!''"
*As a result of the twisted bow's introduction, [[General Graardor]]'s magic level and magic defence bonus were adjusted as the bow originally outperformed other high-end weapons against him.
